Interface Role

public interface Role

Interface for roles

Author:

Method Summary
 void addRole(Role role)
          Assign this role another sub-role.
 java.lang.String getIdentifier()
          A unique identifier for this role instance
 java.util.Set<Role> getRoles()
          Roles are hierarchical, this method returns other roles that have been directly assigned to this role.
 void removeRole(Role role)
          Remove an assigned sub-role from this role.
 void setRoles(java.util.Set<Role> roles)
          Set all the roles which are directly assigned to this role.
